stage1.title: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
stage1.description: Defeat Local Legend: Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone.

stage2.title: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
stage2.description: During the course of completing a single challenge, break all the grappling anchor points before the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone goes into the hovering state.

stage3.title: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
stage3.description: Defeat the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone while she is in the hovering state.
